page.title: 07LEISURE TIME
page.content: During the Summer the old people of Rottingdean are able to spend a lot of time out of doors with their friends. The Winter months, however, force them to spend more time in their homes where they do knitting, reading, writing and drawing. There is much social activity often connected with the W.I. and other groups. Families also spend a large amount of time inside their homes during the winter months. Tea is early and children enjoy TV. They do their homework and play computer games with their family. Friends are often invited round. There is a local baby-sitting syndicate to enable parents to have evenings out.
